item.title: Discrepancies between Meta-Analyses and Subsequent Large Randomized, Controlled Trials
item.description: Reference Jacques LeLorier, Geneviève Grégoire, Abdeltif Benhaddad, Julie Lapierre, François Derderian “Discrepancies between Meta-Analyses and Subsequent Large Randomized, Controlled Trials” (1997) // New England Journal of Medicine.
